title: Lady and the Tramp
creator_credit: Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske, Wilfred Jackson, Walt Disney and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Lady, a pampered cocker spaniel, and Tramp, a jaunty mutt with a heart of gold, join an equally delightful cast of characters for an animated masterpiece. It’s an enthralling story, breathtaking animation and memorable songs, (written and performed by the legendary Peggy Lee) provide unparalleled romance, adventure and enchantment. Rated: G
creator_credit_for_label: Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske, Wilfred Jackson, Walt Disney and Walt Disney Productions
